dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.1.4959

idCitation.resTitle: Grizzly Bear GPS for Kananaskis Region

dataIdInfo.idPurp: Authoritive source data for grizzly bear collar GPS locations collected by Alberta Parks and its partners in the in the Kananaskis Region after circa 2003.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This is the authoritive and most complete data source for grizzly bear collar GPS locations collected by Alberta Parks and its partners in the in the Kananaskis Region after circa 2003, including bears 39, 80, 102, 104, 105, 114, 129, 139, 151, 152, 162, and 165. Data still to be included from Foothills Research Institute, and bear 162 (diiferent from previously listed) a recently collared bear from the Foothills Research Institute. GPS collar from the Eastern Slopes Grizzly Bear Project c. 1994 to 2003 is compiled in a separate file BearGPS1994to2003 and VHF data in the file BearTelemetry1994to2003.
dataIdInfo.suppInfo:
Basic grizzly bear metadata, summer 2014 - Compiled by Cheryl Hojnowski
GB 139 Sex F Age 3 Capture date & location 29 May 2014, Valleyview Weight at time of capture (lbs) 120 Collar type Followit UHF download Fix schedule(s) 15 May - 15 Oct (CURRENT): 1 fix per hour 15 Oct - 15 Nov and 15 Apr - 15 May: 1 fix every 2 hours 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
GB 39 Sex F Age 23 Capture date & location 10 June 2014, Valleyview Weight at time of capture (lbs) 218 Collar type Vectronic 4D GPS Plus X Iridium satellite, serial no 15301 Fix schedule(s) 10 Jun - 26 Jun 2014: One fix every 20 min when inside fence, one fix every 2 hours when outside fence Notes: Bear was almost always inside the fence at this time. Fence is within 0.5 - 1.0 km of roads and trails in western K-Country (PLPP, Spray, Bow Valley) 26 Jun - 13 Jul 2014: Two fixes perday 14 Jul 2014 - 15 Nov 2014 (CURRENT): One fix every 30 min Changed to one fix every 2 hours in 2016 15 Nov - 15 Apr: One fix per day
GB 129 -- Collar failure on 8-9 Aug 2014 Sex M Age 6 or 7 Capture date & location 14 June 2014, Fortress bridge Weight at time of capture (lbs) 320 Collar type Vectronic 4D GPS Plus X Iridium satellite, serial no 15300 Fix schedule(s) 10 Jun - 22 Jul 2014: One fix every 20 min when inside fence, one fix every 2 hours when outside fence 22 Jul - 9 Aug 2014: One fix every 20 min when inside fence, one fix every 30 min when outside fence Notes: Bear was always outside the fence at this time
GB 151 Sex F Age 3 Capture date & location 24 June 2014, KES (free range) Weight at time of capture (lbs) 142 Collar type Followit 2D Iridium satellite Fix schedule(s) 15 May - 15 Oct (CURRENT): 1 fix per hour 15 Oct - 15 Nov and 15 Apr - 15 May: 1 fix every 2 hours 15 Nov-15 Apr: 1 fix per day
Basic grizzly bear metadata, 2015
GB 139 Sex F Age 4 Capture date & location 5 May 2015, Panorama Weight at time of capture (lbs) 170 Collar type Vectronic 2D GPS Plus X Iridium, serial number 16437 Fix schedule(s) 15 Apr - 15 Nov: 1 fix / 30 min 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
GB 114 (collar ceased transmitting in late June 2015) Sex M Age unknown (adult) Capture date & location 22 May 2015, Grizzly Pit Weight at time of capture (lbs) 530 Collar type Vectronic 4D Iridium satellite, serial no 15410 Fix schedule(s) 15 Apr - 15 Nov: 1 fix / 30 min 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
GB 104 Sex F Age 12 Capture date & location 23 May 2015, Canyon (free-range) Weight at time of capture (lbs) 253 Collar type Vectronic 3D GPS Plus X Iridium satellite, serial no 16438 Fix schedule(s) 15 Apr - 15 Nov: 1 fix / 30 min 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
GB 152 Sex F Age 4 Capture date & location 29 May 2015, Galatea, free-range Weight at time of capture (lbs) 170 Collar type Followit 2D Iridium satellite, serial no TSH5-3437 Fix schedule(s) 15 Apr - 15 Nov: 1 fix / 30 min 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
GB 80 Sex F Age 21 Capture date & location 19 Sept 2015, Fortress, free-range Weight at time of capture (lbs) 362 Collar type Vectronic 3D GPS Vertex Iridium satellite, serial no 18844 Fix schedule(s) 15 Apr - 15 Nov: 1 fix / 30 min 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
Basic grizzly bear metadata, 2016
GB 162 (94's orphan cub; collar dropped Oct 2016) Sex M Age 4 Capture date & location 21 May 2016, Lower Lake Campground Weight at time of capture (lbs) 132 Collar type Vectronic 2D Vertex GPS Iridium, serial no 21015 Fix schedule(s) 15 Apr - 15 Nov: 1 fix / 2 hours 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
GB 139 Sex F Age 5 Capture date & location 31 May 2016, Grizzly Pit Weight at time of capture (lbs) 185 Collar type Vectronic 2D GPS Plus X Iridium, serial number 16439 Fix schedule(s) 15 Apr - 15 Nov: 1 fix / 30 min 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
GB 165 (relocated within 2 weeks of capture for depredating donkeys; collar was removed) Sex M Age unknown (estimate: 10-12 years) Capture date & location 4 June 2016, Grizzly Pit Weight at time of capture (lbs) 450 Collar type Vectronic 4D GPS Plus X Iridium satellite, serial no 15299 Fix schedule(s) 15 Apr - 15 Nov: 1 fix / 30 min 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
GB 152 Sex F Age 5 Capture date & location 4 June 2016, Grizzly Pit Weight at time of capture (lbs) 180 Collar type Followit 2D Iridium satellite, serial no TSH5-3654 Fix schedule(s) 15 Apr - 15 Nov: 1 fix / 30 min 15 Nov - 15 Apr: 1 fix per day
End

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

dataLineage.statement: Data was provided in raw format in text or CSV format and cleaned in MS Excel, converted to a table in ArcGIS 10.3, and mapped using the latutuide and longitude coordinates except for bears 102, 105, 151, and 152 which were provided in UTM Zone 11, NAD 83 and converted to WGS84 (ITRF00). Non-fix or time out records were retained (coordinates assigned Null before conversion to table) excep for bear 152 for year 2015 which were cleaned of timed out records before being recieved.
